description: My company’s confidential client list was leaked on a hacker forum.
label: Data Breach

description: My classmate is receiving threatening messages on Telegram from anonymous accounts.
label: Cyberbullying

description: I was blackmailed with edited images that made it look like I was in inappropriate situations.
label: Blackmailing

description: A caller spoofed the number of HDFC Bank and asked me to install AnyDesk app.
label: Vishing

description: An attacker hacked our corporate Outlook account and sent phishing emails to clients.
label: Phishing

description: My Quora account was compromised and spam messages were posted.
label: Social Media Account Hacked

description: A phishing site looked exactly like IRCTC and stole my login credentials.
label: Phishing

description: My Aadhaar data was used to open a Paytm Payments Bank account without my consent.
label: Identity Theft

description: My Twitter DMs were leaked on a forum after an unauthorized login.
label: Data Breach

description: An OLX buyer sent me a QR code to 'receive money' but instead debited my account.
label: Phishing

description: A cybercafé stored my scanned PAN and misused it to open fraudulent bank accounts.
label: Identity Theft

description: My classmate’s Instagram account was hacked and is now being used for crypto scams.
label: Social Media Account Hacked

description: I got a fake GST invoice email with a malware attachment.

description: A ransomware attack froze all my office systems asking for Bitcoin payment.

description: My Gmail recovery email was changed by an attacker and I lost access.

description: Someone created a fake donation page during floods in Assam and collected lakhs in UPI payments.

description: My Facebook profile was duplicated and used to message my relatives for money.

description: My website’s admin panel was hacked and defaced with political slogans.

description: My bank account was debited ₹90,000 after I installed a fake SBI YONO app.

description: A hacker accessed my Google Drive and leaked private documents online.

description: My Steam account was hacked and all my in-game items were stolen.

description: Someone created a fake profile on Shaadi.com with my name and pictures.

description: A stranger threatened to post intimate messages I sent unless I paid ₹20,000.

description: My Paytm wallet was emptied after I shared an OTP with a fake customer support number.

description: My Netflix account was hacked and sold on Telegram as a 'premium login'.

description: An SMS link claiming to be from SBI KYC update redirected to a phishing site.

description: My DigiLocker account was accessed without authorization and driving license stolen.

description: A WhatsApp message claimed my Jio number would be suspended unless I clicked a link.
label: Phishing

description: My Gmail account was hacked and recovery options were changed to a Russian number.

description: An extortionist threatened to release deepfake videos of me unless I paid them.

description: My PUBG account was hacked and the attacker demanded money for return.

description: A phishing call claiming to be from RBI said my bank account was blacklisted and asked me to verify by sharing details.

description: My organization’s payroll system was hacked and salary details leaked.

description: A fake NGO collected funds through UPI during COVID claiming to supply oxygen cylinders.

description: My Instagram was hacked and is now selling fake sneakers.

description: An unknown person registered a fake company using my PAN card details.

description: My cousin was cyberbullied on Snapchat with edited images being circulated.

description: A phishing email mimicked Flipkart and asked me to verify my credit card.

description: Someone posted abusive tweets tagging me and my workplace to damage my reputation.

description: My SBI netbanking account credentials were stolen after I downloaded a fake Excel file.

description: A ransomware attack encrypted my business data and is demanding $2000 in Monero.

description: My LinkedIn account was hacked and used to spam recruiters.

description: My Gmail received a fake email that looked like an EPFO notification.

description: My child’s gaming account was hacked and abusive messages were sent.

description: A caller pretending to be from Delhi Police threatened me to pay ₹50,000 over a fabricated FIR.

description: A viral WhatsApp message claimed a celebrity endorsed a miracle weight-loss pill; people shared personal bank info to order it, but it was fake.

description: A trending tweet falsely stated that the government is offering free iPhones to everyone who registers online; users were asked to provide contact info.

description: A forwarded Instagram story claimed that a new COVID-19 variant vaccine is mandatory for children under 12, spreading panic and misinformation.

description: Someone on an online gaming platform tried to convince my 14-year-old sibling to share private images in exchange for in-game currency.

description: A stranger contacted my child on TikTok, claiming to be a talent scout and asked for revealing videos.
label: Child Exploitation

description: An unknown person on Discord started sending threatening messages to my child, demanding photos in exchange for not posting their chats publicly.
label: Child Exploitation

description: I applied to a remote data entry role and was asked to pay ₹3000 for an 'equipment setup fee', then the recruiter disappeared.

description: A recruitment agency on LinkedIn asked for PAN and bank details for 'background verification' but it was a scam.
label: Job Scam

description: Received an email offering a high-paying internship, but they requested upfront payment for 'training material', then went silent.
label: Job Scam

description: I met someone on a dating app who claimed to be working overseas; they asked me to send money for flight tickets and never returned.
label: Online Romance Scam

description: A person I met online professed love quickly and requested money to cover an 'emergency medical bill'.
label: Online Romance Scam

description: On a social media dating platform, a stranger convinced me to invest in a business opportunity with them, then blocked me after receiving funds.
label: Online Romance Scam

description: I was chatting with someone on a dating site; they claimed to be stranded abroad and asked me to send money for hotel and visa fees.
label: Online Romance Scam

description: Someone I met on a dating website asked for help to transfer inheritance money, promising to repay me, but disappeared after receiving the funds.
label: Online Romance Scam

description: A person on a dating app claimed to be a military officer and requested money to pay customs fees for a package they supposedly sent to me.
label: Online Romance Scam

description: Met a romantic interest online who asked for cryptocurrency transfers to 'secure our future together', then vanished.
label: Online Romance Scam

description: A scammer on a dating platform said they were trapped abroad and needed money for transportation; they blocked me after payment.
label: Online Romance Scam

description: A person on an online dating site promised marriage if I helped pay for a visa; after transferring the money, contact was lost.
